item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello, World! Some nice features of the Hugo Markdown rederer. Incomplete Markdown Cheatsheet Emphasis Markdown in Hugo support all the standard stuff like bold and italic. Lists Ordered item item subitem Unordered item item subitem subitem Extensions It also have some useful extension like tables… col1 col2 col3 text text text text text text text text text text text text …and syntax highlight
